| description    = The paper is ragged-edged and stained with grease. Notes in a barely legible hand detail the preparation of a dish from the cook's childhood called "Sweet Tongue Terrine", but substituted with meat of an unusual provenance.

At the bottom, someone has scrawled, "Make for Eolina and Jun when I get back home."
